quote: Raven scowled through his too-long bangs. “The Angel Song doesn’t hurt humans. It only affects the evil within.” “Then you should be writhing on the ground with the hounds,” Mace mumbled.
quote_letters: RAVEN SCOWLED THROUGH HIS TOO-LONG BANGS THE ANGEL SONG DOESNT HURT HUMANS IT ONLY AFFECTS THE EVIL WITHIN THEN YOU SHOULD BE WRITHING ON THE GROUND WITH THE HOUNDS MACE MUMBLED
